abstract: Spokesman for Bundestag, Germany's lower house of Parliament, says its computer system is under attack by hackers.
lead_paragraph: Hackers have launched an attack on the computer system of the Bundestag, the lower house of the German Parliament, a parliamentary spokesman said Friday.

headline.main: Germany: Hackers Attack Computers in the Lower House of Parliament
headline.print_headline: Europe; Germany: Hackers Attack Computers in the Lower House of Parliament

snippet: Hackers have launched an attack on the computer system of the Bundestag, the lower house of the German Parliament, a parliamentary spokesman said Friday.
